about_the_game:
Original Soundtrack for A Summer with the Shiba Inu visual novel. Composer: Jeffrey Clements

.MP3 and .WAV files available for all tracks!

Preview full tracks for free - please see "visit the website" link to the (bottom) right ->

Or search "effreylementsomposer" on SoundCloud.

Track List


  • ARIna Ambush
  • Battle Time!
  • Deadly Trip
  • In The ARIna
  • Main Theme
  • Quei-li Theme
  • Regret
  • Something in the Shadows
  • Tai-Paw Theme
  • The Plot Thickens
  • Unease

Disclaimer: This DLC does not add any functionality to the game - all the soundtracks appear within the base game.
